mapper.insert: insert into technology.room_garden (id, room, area, status, company_id, company_name, building_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{room,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=REAL}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update technology.room_garden set room = #{room,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=REAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, building_id = #{buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, room, area, status, company_id, company_name, building_id from technology.room_garden
